thread.title: Tom Crone

author: Tom Crone
title: Tom Crone
text:
purchased a product from a site represented as Canadian, the price and shipping costs were good and in Canadian funds, the product was shipped by UPS, when it got here they (UPS) wanted another $51.00 Canadian in additional costs, I did not accept the package as that made the price go up over 50%.
UPS is the worst shipping agency to ship from the US, The people at Hudson Reed should think about what they are doing Canada Hudson Reed says to me a Canadian company, the price they sell for should be at the door no surprise! Hudson Reed did refund me in full no argument at all!
